=== Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut ===

She performs with Pumper again in the film ''Montana Fishburne: An A-List Daughter Makes her XXX Debut'', released on August 18, 2010 by [[Vivid Entertainment]].<ref name="nydn" /> The film is over an hour long and features Fishburne in a car, a hotel room and a [[shopping mall]].<ref name=AVNFlick>{{cite web | title =Laurenceâs Daughter, Montana Fishburne, Stars in XXX Flick for Vivid | publisher =AVN.com | url =http://business.avn.com/articles/Larry-s-Daughter-Montana-Fishburne-Stars-in-XXX-Flick-for-Vivid-405471.html | date = 2010-07-30| accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> Commenting on why she decided to make the film, she said "I view making this movie as an important first step in my career ... I've watched how successful [[Kim Kardashian]] became and I think a lot of it was due to the release of her sex tape by Vivid."<ref name=AVNFlick/> Fishburne says she is in talks with Vivid<ref name=AVNSpeaks>{{cite web | title = AVN Exclusive: Montana Fishburne Speaks| author=Peter Warren| publisher = AVN.com| url =http://business.avn.com/articles/AVN-Exclusive-Montana-Fishburne-Speaks-406615.html | date =2010-08-06 | accessdate = 2010-08-16}}</ref> about signing a multi-picture deal due to the initial commercial success of her debut.<ref name=TMZdeal>{{cite web | title = Porn Again: Montana Fishburne Gets New XXX Offer| author=TMZ Staff| publisher = TMZ.com| url =http://www.tmz.com/2010/08/10/porn-vivid-entertainment-montana-fishburne-multi-picture-deal-laurence-fishburne/ | date =2010-08-11 | accessdate = 2010-08-22}}</ref>
